divs: Sighting Detailsi was looking up into the night sky when i saw aclump of 7-10 seperate white lights traveling from the north to the south,about as fast as a 737at aruond 5000 ft. the lights formed a chevron twice and other positions.as i watched them fade into the south sky.
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Sparks
There was one other sighting in Sparks on or around August 11th 2008
Summary: clump of white orb like lights changing formation
